tool_description: Real-time price data for Indonesian Stock Exchange (IDX)
name: Stock Indonesia Global API
title: Stock Indonesia Global API

api_list.name: stock
api_list.description: get  price info of a stock by ticker symbol in Rupiah (IDR)

optional_parameters.name: interval
optional_parameters.description: Numeric parameter specifying the interval between results, with a default setting of 1 day (P1D). Acceptable values include PT1M (1 minute), PT5M (5 minutes), PT15M (15 minutes), PT30M (30 minutes), PT1H (1 hour), PT5H (5 hours), P1D (1 day, default), P1W (1 week), and P1M (1 month).

optional_parameters.name: period
optional_parameters.description: Time duration or window size, with a default period of 1 month (P1M). Acceptable values include P1D (1 day), P1W (1 week), P1M (1 month, default), P3M (3 months), P6M (6 months), P1Y (1 year), P5Y (5 years), and MAX.
